tasks.label: Auto Build and Run
args: Write-Host 'Building Java Project...' -ForegroundColor Green; if (Test-Path bin) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force bin }; mkdir -Force bin | Out-Null; javac -cp 'lib/*' -d bin -sourcepath src (Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Path src -Include *.java).FullName; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host 'Copying resources...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; if (-not (Test-Path 'bin\image')) { mkdir -Force 'bin\image' | Out-Null }; if (-not (Test-Path 'bin\icon')) { mkdir -Force 'bin\icon' | Out-Null }; if (-not (Test-Path 'bin\pdf')) { mkdir -Force 'bin\pdf' | Out-Null }; Copy-Item 'src\resources\image\*' 'bin\image\' -Force; Copy-Item 'src\resources\icon\*' 'bin\icon\' -Force; Copy-Item 'src\resources\pdf\*' 'bin\pdf\' -Force; Write-Host 'Build successful! Running application...' -ForegroundColor Green; java -cp 'bin;lib/*' app.Main.App } else { Write-Host 'Build failed!' -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: Build Only
